entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
